tasks.label: Run MakeMigration
tasks.command: cd backend && pipenv run flask --app main.py db migrate -m "${input:message}"

tasks.label: Run Migrate
tasks.command: cd backend && pipenv run flask --app main.py db upgrade

tasks.label: Run Undo Migration
tasks.command: cd backend && pipenv run flask --app main.py db downgrade

tasks.label: Run BACK
tasks.command: cd backend && pipenv run python3 main.py

tasks.label: Run TEST
tasks.command: cd backend && pipenv run python3 -m pytest

tasks.label: Run CREATE TABLE
tasks.command: cd backend && pipenv run python3 create_table.py

tasks.label: Run DROP TABLE
tasks.command: cd backend && pipenv run python3 drop_table.py

tasks.label: Run LOAD DATA TO DB
tasks.command: cd backend && pipenv run python3 load_fixtures.py
